price: そこにはあなた方に沢山の果実があり、あなた方はそこから食べるのだ」。
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
